name: rexbid
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Formula-building rule for restricted existential quantifier (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-1998.)
